name: Rockman
overview: Its the 1890's and diamond mining fever has struck Africa. Young men travel from all over the world to make their fortunes and return home rich to marry their sweethearts. One such adventurer is Ricky Rockman from England. A strong young man with the true pioneering spirit aiming to collect as many diamonds as possible and return to Great Britain rich and famous. To achieve this, he will not only need to be strong and brave miner but also keep his wits about him, as there are many baddies about, trying to stop him and steal his diamonds!
